hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Mas'ud narrated that:the Messenger of Allah said: “Whoever begs when he has enough to suffice him, his begging will come on the Day of Resurrection like lacerations on his face. ” It was said: “O Messenger of Allah, what is sufficient for him?” He said: “Fifty Dirham or their value in gold.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ سَأَلَ عَنْ ظَهْرِ، غِنًى
chapter.eng-name: One who asks when he is not in need
